text: Super Bowl LIV (meaning Super Bowl 54 in Roman numerals) was an American football game that decided the winner of the National Football League (NFL) for the 2019 season. The game was played between the Kansas City Chiefs, winners of the American Football Conference (AFC), and the San Francisco 49ers, winners of the National Football Conference (NFC). The Kansas City Chiefs won the game. It was played at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida, on February 2, 2020. ==References== *054 Category:2020 in American sports Category:February 2020 events Category:2020 in American television
title: Super Bowl LIV
